document.full_text: al qaeda's iraqi affiliate on saturday claimed responsibility for a siege at a provincial council headquarters in saddam hussein's hometown in which 58 people were killed.
document.title: al qaeda claims responsibility for iraq's tikrit attack
lines_and_colors: al qaeda's iraqi affiliate on saturday claimed responsibility for a siege at a provincial council headquarters in saddam hussein's hometown in which 58 people were killed.
